sentences.sContent: These changes will involve everyone on the staff.
sentences.sCn: 这些变化将影响每一位职员。

sentences.sContent: There have been four accidents involving Forest Service planes.
sentences.sCn: 已有四次事故涉及（美国）林务局的飞机。

synos.tran: 包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于

words.tran: 牵连；包含；混乱；财政困难
涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）

remMethod.val: in(使…) ＋ volve(卷) → 使卷入， 牵涉

trans.tranOther: to include or affect someone or something
